content.rendered:
[vc_row type=”container”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The TTI-4KR is our most cost-effective C-mount camera option. With HDMI 2.0 output, built-in recording, and wireless functionality it is a great option to start capturing video on a slit lamp or microscope.

  • 4K (2160p) resolution at 60 frames per second
  • 1/3″ 1-chip CMOS sensor
  • Compatible with standard C-mount
  • USB & SD card recording (SD card included)
  • Wireless mouse included to control recorder
  • Transfer recordings over your network wirelessly
  • HDMI and DVI (using HDMI-DVI cable) outputs
  • One-piece design with no separate control unit

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_gallery type=”flexslider_slide” interval=”3″ images=”74036,74037,74039,74038″ img_size=”400×267″ css=”.vc_custom_1597338402279{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_separator color=”#e5e5e5″ type=”normal” thickness=”1″ up=”” down=””][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

TTI-4K-R

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Add 4K medical grade video and recording capability to your slit lamp or microscope at a competitive price. Recording and image management software is built into the camera, and controlled by the included wireless mouse. Still image and video recordings are saved to the included SD card or USB flash drive. Recordings can be transferred manually or over the network using WiFi and Ethernet.

Compatible with all of our Accu-Beam® adapters the TTI-4KR can be configured to any magnification you prefer, with the option for optical zoom for the best video experience.

Sample videos can be found on our YouTube page.

Part # TTI-4K-R[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”container”][vc_column][vc_tta_tabs color=”white” active_section=”1″][vc_tta_section title=”Compatibility” tab_id=”1569386751404-824b66ba-0d54e2c6-350c”][vc_column_text]Compatible with all C-mount adapters including our Accu-Beam® video adapters.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Regulatory” tab_id=”1569386751419-a33a2db6-6e3de2c6-350c”][vc_column_text]The TTI-4K-R is a class 1 device, and is approved to bear the CE mark.

TTI Medical is registered with the FDA and ISO 13485:2016 certified.[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][vc_tta_section title=”Warranty” tab_id=”1569387831165-1b59dea1-014ae2c6-350c”][vc_column_text]

All of our products include a 1 year manufacturer’s warranty and support for the usable lifetime of the product.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_tta_section][/vc_tta_tabs][/vc_column][/vc_row]
